com.artemis

Class SystemInvocationStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.SystemInvocationStrategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvocationStrategy

    public abstract class SystemInvocationStrategy
extends Object
    Delegate for system invocation. Maybe you want to more granular control over system invocations, feed certain systems different deltas, or completely rewrite processing in favor of events. Extending this class allows you to write your own logic for processing system invocation. Register it with WorldConfigurationBuilder.register(SystemInvocationStrategy) Be sure to call updateEntityStates() after the world dies.
    See Also:
    for the default strategy.
